creator: bpavel@yahoo.com
text:
After installing 
jdk-6u18-windows-i586.exe and
apache-tomcat-6.0.24.exe
Tomcat service fails with 
[2010-02-05 15:03:23] [info] Procrun (2.0.6.0) started
[2010-02-05 15:03:23] [info] Running Service...
[2010-02-05 15:03:23] [info] Starting service...
[2010-02-05 15:03:23] [info] Error occurred during initialization of VM
[2010-02-05 15:03:23] [info] java/lang/NoClassDefFoundError
[2010-02-05 15:03:23] [info] : java/lang/Object

jdk-6u16-windows-i586.exe and
apache-tomcat-6.0.24.exe works fine

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This works for me in both 32-bit and 64-bit environments. Please use the users list if you require further assistance.
